attributes.action: Increase VAT by a measured amount
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is about the only tax that everybody has to pay in one way or another , rather than tinker with other taxes which upset and affect the minority  , that VAT  should be increased  by an amount that would reduce or eliminate the need for other unpopoulr taxes since this tax ( VAT) has to be paid by all regardless of age, income , sex or nationality .
